title: CNN needs more than a new CEO. It needs a business strategy
description: Killing CNN+ set Chris Licht behind the eight ball because it left him with no clear vision for the future of the news organization.

title: FDA advisors recommend AstraZeneca, Sanofi antibody to protect babies from RSV
description: If the Food and Drug Administration approves nirsevimab, it will be the first medical intervention available in the U.S. that can protect infants from RSV.

title: El Niño is here and could bring warmer temperatures, more extreme weather patterns
description: A climate pattern called El Niño has been expected for months, and NOAA said Thursday it has arrived. It is expected to strengthen into the winter in the U.S.

title: Biden sends firefighters, aid to Canada as wildfire smoke blankets much of the U.S.
description: President Joe Biden said the government was aiding Canada in fighting the wildfires that have cloaked the East Coast and Midwest in smoke.

title: The U.S. economy keeps skirting recession, but consumer sector might slowly be splitting apart
description: Economic data and corporate guidance paint a confusing picture of the U.S. economy and whether consumers are beginning to strain.

title: Canada wildfire smoke again slows flights in the Eastern U.S.
description: Poor visibility from Canada wildfire smoke threatened to delay flights at airports in New York City, Philadelphia, Charlotte and Washington, D.C.

title: Not a question of money: Soccer legend Lionel Messi chooses Inter Miami in blow to Saudi Arabia
description: "If it had been a question of money, I would have gone to [Saudi] Arabia or elsewhere where they offered me a lot of money," Messi said.

title: Euro zone enters recession after Germany, Ireland growth revision
description: The euro zone entered a recession in the first quarter of this year and economists are not optimistic for the coming months.

title: This family office with tech billionaire clients backs French rival to Microsoft Excel
description: Pigment is best known for its business planning and forecasting platform that's designed to be more user-friendly than Microsoft's Excel.

title: Goldman Sachs expected the Turkish lira to plunge over 3 months. It happened in just 3 days
description: The Turkish lira has extended its post-election freefall this week.

title: Singapore economic czar Tharman Shanmugaratnam to run for president
description: Singapore's veteran economic policymaker is resigning to contest the Southeast Asian city-state's presidency, a largely symbolic head of state role.

title: China's big banks cut deposit rates, signaling monetary easing ahead
description: China's largest banks cut interest rates for savers on Thursday in a bid to boost growth in an economy where consumption has been slow to recover.

title: Australia's Canva expands A.I.-powered design business to Europe
description: Australian graphic design company Canva has said it is in a "uniquely strong position" to withstand industry headwinds as it embarks on its European expansion.

title: France's Macron seeks to show he's no lame duck as pension discontent rumbles on
description: To prove he still has political capital to serve his remaining four years in office, the president will seek wins on defense, green industry and migration.

title: Twice as many Europeans see Russia as an adversary since the Ukraine war
description: Twice as many Europeans now see Russia as an adversary as did before the war, yet almost half are unconfident that Ukraine will defeat its opponent.

title: Google to crack down on office attendance, asks remote workers to reconsider
description: Google's HR chief told workers that office attendance will be more closely monitored

title: It’s now cheaper for travelers to go to Bhutan — if they stay long enough
description: Travelers who visit Bhutan for at least five nights won't have to pay the full amount for the country's daily $200 tourist tax, or Sustainable Development Fee.

title: U.S.-China chip war could hurt South Korea's tech giants — but not for long, Fitch says
description: South Korea's memory chip makers Samsung Electronics and SK hynix face risks from U.S.-China tensions but the impact is likely to be small, says Fitch Ratings.

title: Trump told he is target of Mar-a-Lago documents criminal probe by special counsel
description: Special counsel Jack Smith is investigating Donald Trump for retaining classified records at his residence in Florida after leaving the White House.

title: The world's energy system is 'no longer fit for purpose,' says energy council chief
description: The council's most recent report forecasts that around half of the global energy system will still not be electrified by 2050.

title: New York overtakes Hong Kong as the most expensive city in the world for expats, new survey shows
description: Nearly all Asian locations surveyed fell in rankings, indicating that expats will find living in Asia "relatively cheaper," said ECA International.

title: Japan's GDP revised sharply higher, grew 2.7% in the first quarter on robust spending
description: Economists surveyed by Reuters had expected to see growth of 1.9%
